measured_by: Verbal Behavior Milestones Assessment and Placement Program (VB-MAPP)
justification: The article lists VB-MAPP as “criterion-referenced skill assessment” that practitioners may administer via telehealth, indicating it is the tool used to assess language and social skill milestones.

In the Testing and Assessment section the authors caution practitioners to use “Assessment of Functional Living Skills (Partington & Mueller, 2012)” remotely, showing this instrument is intended to measure functional living skills.

The paper refers to “telehealth-based parent-coaching FA assessments” and stresses using “Functional Analysis” to evaluate problem behavior functions, identifying FA as the measurement method for this construct.

Under Equipment, the authors note that materials for the “Picture Exchange Communication System (PECS; Frost & Bondy, 1994)” may be required for clinical services, implying PECS is employed to assess and develop a client’s communication abilities.
